data.title: You know I love to go there!
data.text: Cheesecake Factory is really quite great at what it does and the Boca location is no different. Food is very good, with huge portions and the service was very friendly.

data.title: Raisarrrttt
data.text: Nice food.  Service also very nice. Waitress was very friendly as well.  No waiting in line which is always a plus. A bit loud

data.title: Who Can Doubt The Cheese Cake Is Fabulous?
data.text: We try and go here a few times a month because we really enjoy the fabulous choices.  We usually pick one of the salads or burgers then struggle to decide on a cheesecake.  It is a struggle! Advice: Buy 2 and take one home.  You know you're going to want to eat it or share it with a friend. Favorite:  Vanilla Bean

data.title: Fun brunch with friends
data.text: Cheesecake factory is an awesome place to go and enjoy time with your friends and family the portions are big the selection is amazing the service was great and everything tastes incredible and the desserts how can you not love him them

data.title: consistant just like ever other cheese cake factory
data.text: This place has always been average. We went hear for lunch I had a Caesar salad and my wife had the same with grilled chicken.

data.title: Nice menus
data.text:
This is a great place to celebrate any occasion. The food and the venue is wonderful. 

I would say it's great for a large group. Not so much for just a couple. It's a bit chilly so walk with some something warm

data.title: First, but not Last Visit
data.text: It is hard to believe that this was our first visit to The Cheesecake Factory, but it certainly will not be our last--their food and service were excellent!  We tried the White Chicken Chile, Chicken Piccata, Chicken Madeira, and Thai Glazed Salmon and everything was wonderful.  We would all have liked cheesecake but found that we were too full for dessert.  If we were not going to be driving across Florida the next day, we would have taken some home for when we were less full--it looked fantastic!  The Cheesecake Factory that is closest to our home is about 60 miles away, but we will be making that a stop when we head toward Atlanta or Greenville, SC.

data.title: Mediocre in most respects
data.text:
Visited again after a long break and found the place had become mediocre in most respects. 

The decor was tired and was looking drab. The initial greeting was tired and not friendly or warm.

Service was slow initially in that at a relatively late hour it took too long before we had an opportunity to place our order. And then we waited a long time for appetisers to appear - so long that one of us went to find the manager to see if matters could be made to improve.

The appetisers were alright - that is the edamame and the ahi tartare. Meanwhile, pot stickers were overcooked.

Main courses were so-so. The skinny Chicken Pot Pie was alright though rather runny and unfortunately the bread basket had disappeared thus preventing dunking that might have been enjoyable. The fire roast artichoke was good. But the spicy cashew chicken was only alright and also seemed dull - but then so was most of the meal. 

Incidentally, at least the manager came in person to serve one of the main courses, as though to show some improvement intent.

Overall though, this place seems to have deteriorated - sheer quantity of food is not enough to overcome the mediocrity.

data.title: Meal was good until....
data.text: Ordered dinner to go..Got the chicken with mashed potatoes and green beans. Good as usual until I found plastic sticking out of the chicken. Luckily I saw it before eating that part or could have easily choked.

data.title: The best restaurant around
data.text: No doubt that The Cheesecake Factory is the best restaurant around. The variety of food and prices are unbeatable!

data.title: A little pricey but large portions
data.text: I go to Cheesecake for lunch because it's right next to my office. The lunch portions are large but a bit pricey. The salads from the lunch menu are $15. Not something I can plurge on everyday. Usually crowded so I prefer to sit at the bar.

data.title: Salad as Comfort Food!
data.text:
Quiet afternoon lunch in the bar area. Top notch server.  Devoured the Almond Crusted Salmon Salad on the "Super menu".  Can't think of a better salad entree that I ever had!  Topped off with Key Lime Mango cheesecake, heavenly and light!  They do have great housemade unsweetened iced tea, too.
This was in the Boca Raton location.  Now I live in Jacksonville so can't wait to try the same items here!

data.title: Old favorite
data.text:
Have had everything here from brunch, lunch and dinner.  Always great.

Service is very good, menu is huge...leave room for cheesecake.  Umpteen varieties to chose from...plus cakes and apple dumpling outstanding!

data.title: Everything I Expected
data.text: Went to the Cheesecake Factory for the first time.  Loved it.  Right from the bread, appetizer, main and cheesecake the food was excellent.  Service was rocky to start but ended very strong.  Went back the next night as well

data.title: Love this place
data.text:
Always get the small plate of  3 lettuce wraps with chicken..and add more peanut sauce, the green sauce, and the spicy sauce that come with the full entree of the lettuce wraps n

Best lettuce wraps around! Enough food for one and always delicious!

data.title: Dinner
data.text: Had the ahi tuna salad. The portion of tuna was large and was very fresh. We were a large party but were served timely and correctly.

data.title: What can I say--so many fantastic choices & out of this world cheesecake to end your meal
data.text: Have visited many times.  The food choices are unbelievable.  There is something for anyone.  The service has always been above par.  Food portions are large, usually more than enough to take home and finish later.  And then the cheesecake!!!!  There are so many different ones, it's hard to make a choice.  Guess you'll just have to go everyday until you've tried them all😃😃😃

data.title: Dinner
data.text: Very LOUD!!!  Tables very close to each other!  Very difficult to hear the 4 people at our table!!  Don't go...... YOU CAN'T HAVE A CONVERSATION WITH ONE ANOTHER!

data.title: Burger uncooked
data.text: We went to eat here because we knew what to expect.  Our food came out and the burger meat was actually uncooked and cold in places.  Really sad!

data.title: When you have no idea what you want to eat...go to Cheesecake Factory
data.text: ...there's so many things on the menu you are bound to find something you want here.  Very popular, casual, bar area, food not gourmet but good and presented nicely.  Wait staff seems to be well trained and attentive.  Factory Salad excellent.  "Skinny Salmon" delicious and healthy.  Cheesecakes...huge...wow...share.
